order.subject: Assignment of In-charge, Campus Security
order.body: In supersession of earlier order vide No. F NITA.2.(493-Estt)/2018/Vol-II/L/475-81, dated 09-05-2023 and based on the approval of the Competent Authority, Mr. Manik Debnath, Security Officer (Cont), is hereby assigned as In-charge, Campus Security of NIT Agartala with immediate effect.
order.handoverInstructions: Mr. Abhishek Kumar Yadav, SAS Officer, is instructed to hand over the charges to Mr. Manik Debnath, Security Officer at the earliest
